Safe to say the first-ever #SymphonyatSunset was a success based on the huge crowd. Next year they may need an even larger space! Would also be nice if the stage faced the opposite direction, so concert-goers didn’t have their backs turned to the sunset. Great job, @VSOrchestra! https://t.co/YR1GPHfYAs

@j_mcelroy I love Solly’s, but in the past 12 months every time I’ve gone in there I’ve been greeted with long waits, confusion, or demoralized staff who openly complain to customers. I’ve switched to @siegelsbagels where the staff are jubilant when you walk through the door. #yvrbagelwars
